channel.title: Disconnect & Portforwarded
channel.description: I have portforwarded my 317 server and I had put it on so some friends could test it with me, but suddenly after 2-3 minutes they totally disconnect. (Their client gets exit also) So I am wondering how this is getting caused, I've checked EVERYTHING which had to be inflicting this. The only thing I guess it that I had less RAM while the server was online / portforwarded. Because I had done this before using Hamachi, but no problem was occured, only when portforwarded. (Only they get kicked, not me, also nothing is listed on the command prompt).

item.title: Disconnect & Portforwarded
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

That’s the problem, it doesn’t display ANYTHING, and as far as I know, closing the client completely has nothing to do with the server… Right?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnect & Portforwarded
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

The client crashed due to some reason.
Find out why and maybe you can fix it. It would help if you told us if server displayed any messages.

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnect & Portforwarded
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Berky-Scape:

I have portforwarded my 317 server and I had put it on so some friends could test it with me, but suddenly after 2-3 minutes they totally disconnect. (Their client gets exit also) So I am wondering how this is getting caused, I’ve checked EVERYTHING which had to be inflicting this. The only thing I guess it that I had less RAM while the server was online / portforwarded. Because I had done this before using Hamachi, but no problem was occured, only when portforwarded. (Only they get kicked, not me, also nothing is listed on the command prompt).

hmm try to open your ports again with portfowarding and also reset your router and modem? maybe you could try using a different source?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnect & Portforwarded
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Nothing is being sent, I only hear that the client closes (Command Prompt saying ‘Click any button to continue’)and they get disconnected.

item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

I have already did, doesn’t work. The weird thing is the client of the disconnected player also closes. It’s not like a regular disconnect.

Read full topic
